allthecompatibility.configuration.title: AllTheCompatibility Configuration
allthecompatibility.configuration.update: Activate whether the game should check at every world start whether your mod matches the latest version
allthecompatibility.configuration.patreo: Enables ingame rewards on first spawn for Patreons and supporters
allthecompatibility.configuration.mekani: AllTheOres only generates shards, clumps & dirty dusts if Mekanism is installed, this makes many ATC recipes invalid, so ATC lets them generate even if Mekanism is not installed
